front.title: IEEE Standard for Adoption of ISO/IEC 14102:2008 Information Technology--Guideline for the Evaluation and Selection of CASE Tools

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard adopts ISO/IEC 14102:2008 and defines both a set of processes and a structured set of computer-aided software engineering (CASE) tool characteristics for use in the technical evaluation and the ultimate selection of a CASE tool. It follows the software product evaluation model defined in ISO/IEC 14598-5:1998.
